allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Home Management App

Features:
- Calendar with Google Calendar sync
- Contacts with Google sync
- Movies catalog \(TMDB integration\)
- Games library with loan tracking
- Kids rewards/sticker system
- Shopping lists with AI categorization
- Recipes with AI suggestions and URL import
- Home assets/inventory with warranty tracking
- Books library with Open Library integration
- Tasks/Todos with energy-based prioritization
- Chores management
- Mood tracking
- Travel map with trip logging
- Pantry inventory with barcode scanning
- Notifications system
- Weather widget

Tech stack:
- Backend: Node.js, Express, TypeScript, SQLite
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Vite
- AI: Anthropic Claude for smart features
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Plant Care, Meal Planner, Emergency Info, Family Rules, and Kiosk improvements

New Features:
- Plant Care: Track plants, watering schedules, care suggestions, watering history
- Meal Planner: Weekly meal planning integrated with recipes, shopping list generation
- Emergency Info: Emergency contacts, important info \(medical, home, insurance\)
- Family Rules: Manage family rules with categories and drag-to-reorder
- Vacation Mode: Pause notifications during vacations

Kiosk Mode Improvements:
- Compact layout to fit on one screen without scrolling
- Sleep mode with dimmed moving clock after 2 min inactivity
- Emergency Info button in kiosk footer

UI Updates:
- Added banner images for Plants, Family Rules, Emergency Info pages
- Removed redundant text headers where banners exist
- Added navigation tiles for new features on home page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
